messages.content: a link will be generated if the givenNames of the source and the target have a Ratcliff similarity of 62% and the givenName of the source and the description of the target have a Mongeelkan similarity of 25% and the givenNames of the source and the target have a Jaccard similarity of 62% and a Ratcliff similarity and a Mongeelkan similarity of a 25%

AND(AND(ratcliff(x.givenName,y.givenName)|0.62,AND(AND(mongeElkan(x.givenName,y.description)|0.25,jaccard(x.givenName,y.givenName)|0.62)|0.62,ratcliff(x.givenName,y.givenName)|0.25)|0.25)|0.62,mongeElkan(x.givenName,y.givenName)|0.25)

a link will be generated if the names of the source and the target have a Qgrams similarity of 45% and the directors of the source and the target have a Jarowinkler similarity of 100% and the names of the source and the target have a Jaccard similarity of 45% and a Qgrams similarity and a Jarowinkler similarity of a 100%
AND(AND(qgrams(x.name,y.name)|0.45,AND(AND(jaroWinkler(x.director,y.director)|1.0,jaccard(x.name,y.name)|0.45)|0.45,qgrams(x.name,y.name)|1.0)|1.0)|0.45,jaroWinkler(x.name,y.name)|1.0)

a link will be generated if the name of the source and the streetName of the target have an Overlap similarity of 45% and the streetNames of the source and the target have a Qgrams similarity of 37% and the names of the source and the target have a Soundex similarity of 45% and the name of the source and the streetName of the target have a Qgrams similarity of 37% and the streetName of the source and the name of the target have a Soundex similarity of 37%

AND(AND(overlap(x.name,y.streetName)|0.45,AND(AND(qgrams(x.streetName,y.streetName)|0.37,soundex(x.name,y.name)|0.45)|0.45,qgrams(x.name,y.streetName)|0.37)|0.45)|0.45,soundex(x.streetName,y.name)|0.37)

a link will be generated if the firstName of the source and the director of the target have a Jaccard similarity of 62% and a Qgrams similarity of 37% and the directors of the source and the target have a Jarowinkler similarity of 62% and the firstName of the source and the director of the target have a Soundex similarity of 37% and the directors of the source and the target have a Qgrams similarity of 37%

AND(AND(jaccard(x.firstName,y.director)|0.62,AND(AND(qgrams(x.firstName,y.director)|0.37,jaroWinkler(x.director,y.director)|0.62)|0.62,soundex(x.firstName,y.director)|0.37)|0.62)|0.62,qgrams(x.director,y.director)|0.37)

a link will be generated if the titles of the source and the target have a Trigrams similarity of 62% or the descriptions of the source and the target have a Cosine similarity of 100% or the titles of the source and the target have a Trigrams similarity of 100% and the descriptions of the source and the target have a Ratcliff similarity of 62% or the titles of the source and the target have a Jarowinkler similarity of 62% or the descriptions of the source and the target have a Trigrams similarity of 100%

OR(OR(OR(trigrams(x.title,y.title)|0.62,AND(OR(cosine(x.description,y.description)|1.0,trigrams(x.title,y.title)|1.0)|0.62,ratcliff(x.description,y.description)|0.62)|1.0)|1.0,jaroWinkler(x.title,y.title)|0.62)|0.62,trigrams(x.description,y.description)|1.0)
a link will be generated if the titles of the source and the target have an Overlap similarity of 0% and the title of the source and the director of the target have a Cosine similarity of 37%
AND(overlap(x.title,y.title)|0.0,cosine(x.title,y.director)|0.37)

a link will be generated if the titles of the source and the target have a Mongeelkan similarity of 62% and a Jaccard similarity of 100% and the movies of the source and the target have a Mongeelkan similarity of 62% and the titles of the source and the target have a Jaccard similarity of 100%
AND(AND(mongeElkan(x.title,y.title)|0.62,jaccard(x.title,y.title)|1.0)|0.62,AND(mongeElkan(x.movie,y.movie)|0.62,jaccard(x.title,y.title)|1.0)|1.0)

a link will be generated if the firstName of the source and the director of the target have a Jaccard similarity of 0% or a Qgrams similarity of 25% or the directors of the source and the target have an Overlap similarity of 0% or the firstName of the source and the director of the target have a Soundex similarity of 25% or the directors of the source and the target have a Qgrams similarity of 25%

OR(OR(jaccard(x.firstName,y.director)|0.0,OR(OR(qgrams(x.firstName,y.director)|0.25,overlap(x.director,y.director)|0.0)|0.0,soundex(x.firstName,y.director)|0.25)|0.0)|0.0,qgrams(x.director,y.director)|0.25)

a link will be generated if the descriptions of the source and the target have a Qgrams similarity of 62% or the firstName of the source and the description of the target have a Jaccard similarity of 37% or the firstNames of the source and the target have a Mongeelkan similarity of 62% or the firstName of the source and the description of the target have a Qgrams similarity of 37%
OR(OR(qgrams(x.description,y.description)|0.62,jaccard(x.firstName,y.description)|0.37)|0.62,OR(mongeElkan(x.firstName,y.firstName)|0.62,qgrams(x.firstName,y.description)|0.37)|0.62)

a link will be generated if the titles of the source and the target have a Soundex similarity of 62% and the title of the source and the author of the target have a Jarowinkler similarity of 100% and the titles of the source and the target have a Cosine similarity of 62% or a Soundex similarity or a Jarowinkler similarity of 100%
OR(OR(soundex(x.title,y.title)|0.62,OR(AND(jaroWinkler(x.title,y.authors)|1.0,cosine(x.title,y.title)|0.62)|0.62,soundex(x.title,y.title)|1.0)|1.0)|0.62,jaroWinkler(x.title,y.title)|1.0)
